languages.text: "Если это тот астропат, о котором я думаю, то хор Даргонуса возглавит куда более сильный псайкер, чем Прас. Определенно, связь между мирами протектората улучшится".

"If that is the Astropath I am thinking of, the Dargonus Choir is going to be headed by a much stronger psyker than Pras. That will definitely improve communication between the protectorate's worlds."
languages.original_text: "Если это тот астропат, о котором я думаю, то хор Даргонуса возглавит куда более сильный псайкер, чем Прас. Определенно, связь между мирами протектората улучшится".

languages.text: "Wenn das der Astropath ist, an den ich denke, wird der Chor auf Dargonus bald von einem deutlich stärkeren Psioniker als Pras geleitet. Das wird die Kommunikation zwischen den Welten des Protektorats definitiv verbessern."
languages.original_text: "If that is the Astropath I am thinking of, the Dargonus Choir is going to be headed by a much stronger psyker than Pras. That will definitely improve communication between the protectorate's worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das der Astropath ist, an den ich denke, wird der Chor auf Dargonus bald von einem deutlich stärkeren Psioniker als Pras geleitet. Das wird die Kommunikation zwischen den Welten des Protektorats definitiv verbessern."

languages.text: « S'il s'agit bien de l'astropathe auquel je pense, le chœur de Dargonus va avoir à sa tête un psyker bien plus puissant que Pras, ce qui ne manquera pas d'améliorer la communication entre les divers mondes du protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "If that is the Astropath I am thinking of, the Dargonus Choir is going to be headed by a much stronger psyker than Pras. That will definitely improve communication between the protectorate's worlds."

traits.locale_text: « S'il s'agit bien de l'astropathe auquel je pense, le chœur de Dargonus va avoir à sa tête un psyker bien plus puissant que Pras, ce qui ne manquera pas d'améliorer la communication entre les divers mondes du protectorat. »

languages.text: “如果您提到的那位唱诗大师也是我心中的人选，那达戈努斯的星语唱诗班的新任领袖，灵能能力想必会比普拉斯大师更加强大。这样一来，王朝众多世界之间的沟通情况肯定会得到改善。”
languages.original_text: "If that is the Astropath I am thinking of, the Dargonus Choir is going to be headed by a much stronger psyker than Pras. That will definitely improve communication between the protectorate's worlds."

traits.locale_text: “如果您提到的那位唱诗大师也是我心中的人选，那达戈努斯的星语唱诗班的新任领袖，灵能能力想必会比普拉斯大师更加强大。这样一来，王朝众多世界之间的沟通情况肯定会得到改善。”

languages.text: «Si se trata del Astrópata en el que pienso, el Coro de Dargonus tendrá un maestro mucho más poderoso que Pras. Eso mejorará la comunicación entre los mundos del protectorado, sin duda».
languages.original_text: "If that is the Astropath I am thinking of, the Dargonus Choir is going to be headed by a much stronger psyker than Pras. That will definitely improve communication between the protectorate's worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Si se trata del Astrópata en el que pienso, el Coro de Dargonus tendrá un maestro mucho más poderoso que Pras. Eso mejorará la comunicación entre los mundos del protectorado, sin duda».

languages.text: 「もし私が思っている通りの感応通信官であれば、ダルゴナス聖歌隊はプラスよりもはるかに強力な異能者に率いられることになります。それによって、保護領内の惑星間通信は確実に改善されるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "If that is the Astropath I am thinking of, the Dargonus Choir is going to be headed by a much stronger psyker than Pras. That will definitely improve communication between the protectorate's worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「もし私が思っている通りの感応通信官であれば、ダルゴナス聖歌隊はプラスよりもはるかに強力な異能者に率いられることになります。それによって、保護領内の惑星間通信は確実に改善されるでしょう」

languages.text: "Verecekleri, o düşündüğüm Astropat ise Dargonus Korosu'nun başına Pras'tan çok daha güçlü bir ruhsezer geçiyor demektir. Protektoranın dünyaları arasındaki iletişim, çok daha iyi bir hâle gelecektir."
languages.original_text: "If that is the Astropath I am thinking of, the Dargonus Choir is going to be headed by a much stronger psyker than Pras. That will definitely improve communication between the protectorate's worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Verecekleri, o düşündüğüm Astropat ise Dargonus Korosu'nun başına Pras'tan çok daha güçlü bir ruhsezer geçiyor demektir. Protektoranın dünyaları arasındaki iletişim, çok daha iyi bir hâle gelecektir."
